title: Unable to remove nail polish from deceased, can we still bury her? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: if anyone is unable to remove the nail polish from deceased nails even after remove so is it allowed to bury her yeah there's no problem in that you are not obliged to remove her varnish nail varnish if there is difficulty or it requires a lot of of work but if it's normal acetone or nail polish remover and you remove that no problem if there are traces again there is no problem with that this has no impact on her burial
